attributes.action: spend some of the education budget on sky satelite channels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the government should in conjunction with  sky  fund  4 channels that cover the following educational and family issues
Channel 1  languages - French Spanish German Latin welsh Dutch etc these programs should be educational in other languages 
Channel 2 cultural TV channel this should host documentary and discussion programs to help all members to better understand each others cultures
Channel 3 sciences physics biology chemistry social sciences etc 
Channel 4 society channels - about living and working in Britain acceptable and unacceptable behaviour, about being a good citizen neighbour mother father teacher etc also cover employment issues like interviews and training opportunities the armed forces police fire service prison service etc 
All the above channels should be education, and where possible linked to the national curriculum they should also be available through free view digi boxes

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
